message:
🚨 LATEST: Charles Hoskinson says Ethereum may not survive the next 10–15 years, citing architectural flaws, governance issues, and value leakage from Layer 2s. 

The Cardano founder warned that without major changes, Ethereum could follow the path of tech giants like BlackBerry.

News | Markets | YouTube

⚡️ JUST IN: Coinbase and PayPal have expanded their partnership to accelerate the adoption of PayPal’s stablecoin, $PYUSD. 

As part of this collaboration, Coinbase will waive all platform fees for buying, selling, and trading PYUSD, and enable 1:1 redemption for U.S. dollars.

🚨 Alabama drops its case against Coinbase.

• Of $1.4B in stolen crypto, 68.57% remains traceable, 27.59% has gone dark, 3.84% frozen.

• Bounties needed: Only 70 of 5,443 reports were valid

Authorities say he lost the funds on crypto trading and online gambling, later admitting to a gambling addiction and reckless behavior.

🔥 LATEST: OpenAI unveiled two new AI models, o3 and o4 mini, that can analyze images with impressive precision. 

Users say the models can identify exact locations from photos using details like building facades, menus, or selfies.

🚨ALERT: Manta Network’s Kenny Li suspects the Lazarus Group tried to target him in a deepfake Zoom attack. 

Hackers used a fake video and pushed a script download before disappearing.

🚨 UPDATE: Kiloex has fully recovered stolen funds from the recent breach. 

Legal action is underway, and all affected users have been reimbursed.

🇰🇬 JUST IN: Kyrgyzstan's president signs CBDC law giving "digital som" legal tender status. 

The National Bank now has exclusive rights to issue the digital currency, though the final launch decision isn't expected until the end of 2026.
